How to Open a Company in Bulgaria Remotely in 2026

Opening a company in Bulgaria remotely in 2026 is fully legal and structured. With 10% corporate tax and euro adoption, Bulgaria is one of the most attractive EU jurisdictions.

Why Choose Bulgaria

10% Corporate Tax

  • 10% flat corporate income tax
  • 10% flat personal income tax
  • Transparent system

Euro in 2026

  • No currency risks
  • Easier EU payments
  • Banking stability

EU Market Access

  • 450+ million consumers
  • EU contracts
  • European tenders
